title: S3 Ep159: Extremely Hasty Flush: Monday, October 5th, 2020
itunes:title: Extremely Hasty Flush: Monday, October 5th, 2020
description:
• Lizzo dances to D'Angelo in blue lingerie in Rihanna's Savage X Fenty show (Page Six Style)
  • Reba McEntire and Darius Rucker to Host 2020 CMA Awards: 'It's an Absolute Honor' (PEOPLE)
  • Pregnant Stassi Schroeder says her daughter has a hole in her heart (Page Six)
  • Sadie Robertson Expecting First Child with Husband Christian Huff: 'Screaming with Excitement!' (PEOPLE), Chiara Ferragni is Pregnant (Instagram)
  • North West, on how to make the world better: 'Make everyone have more dogs' (Page Six)
Real Housewives of Potomac Recap

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Jackie Oshry (@jackieoproblems)
